survey_brief: This survey aims to gather student and faculty feedback on current sustainability initiatives and identify areas for improvement on the university campus.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of the sustainability initiatives currently implemented on campus?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point Likert scale for clear differentiation without neutral midpoint.

script.question_text: How aware are you of the sustainability initiatives currently implemented on campus?

questions.question_text: Which of the following campus sustainability initiatives are you most satisfied with? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Sustainable food options in dining halls
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with a 'None of the above' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes, at least one selection required.

script.question_text: Which of the following campus sustainability initiatives are you most satisfied with? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Sustainable food options in dining halls

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented on campus?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 300 characters.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented on campus?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in campus sustainability programs if more opportunities were offered?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point Likert scale to avoid neutral responses.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in campus sustainability programs if more opportunities were offered?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in current campus sustainability initiatives?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Not very likely' or 'Not likely at all' in Q4
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with open-text field for specifics.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in current campus sustainability initiatives?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Not very likely' or 'Not likely at all' in Q4
